teams.name: Mechanical team
teams.description: The "mech" team is responsible for designing and building the plane

subteams.name: UGV Team
subteams.description: The UGV team designs and builds the Unmanned Ground Vehicle for the competition.

subteams.name: CAD Team
subteams.description: The CAD Team uses Computer Assisted Design (CAD) programs such as a Fusion 360 to design the plane virtually.

teams.name: Programming team
teams.description: The programming team is responsible for implementing all programming related aspects of the competition

teams.name: Electronics team
teams.description: The electronics team sets up all of the electronics for the plane and works closely with the mechanical team.
